action_items.title: Secure mortgage pre-approval and rate quotes
action_items.description: Contact 2–3 lenders and a broker to confirm maximum affordable monthly payment (€1,400–€1,800), mortgage amount (~€330k–€400k), and lock indicative rates. Request offers with 10–15 year fixed terms and compare total cost, Sondertilgung options, and fees.

action_items.title: Define criteria and expand search radius around Munich
action_items.description: Clarify must‑haves vs nice‑to‑haves for a 4-room+ apartment. Given budget fit, prioritize larger units in outer districts or commuter towns (e.g., Dachau, Freising, Ebersberg, Fürstenfeldbruck) and consider townhouses/maisonettes. Set price filters to €500k–€560k.

action_items.title: Set savings plan and protect the down payment
action_items.description: Ring‑fence the €200k for down payment and closing costs in high‑yield insured accounts. Build/maintain a 6‑month emergency fund separate from purchase funds. Automate monthly surplus to reach an extra €10k–€20k buffer for furnishings and move‑in costs.

action_items.title: Leverage subsidies and favorable loan programs
action_items.description: Check eligibility for KfW Wohneigentum programs (e.g., 124) and energy‑efficient options (297/298) to lower rates. Ask lenders to structure financing so fees are covered from cash and mortgage fits payment cap.

action_items.title: Begin targeted viewings and data‑driven shortlisting
action_items.description: Schedule 2–3 viewings per week in shortlisted areas. Track €/m², HOA/Hausgeld, energy class, commute, and expected renovations. Aim for 120–150 m² in outer areas or 90–110 m² closer in if layout is efficient.

action_items.title: Offer and negotiation strategy
action_items.description: Use pre‑approval to bid decisively. Target properties on market >30 days to improve leverage. Negotiate shared/buyer‑reduced brokerage where possible and seek price adjustments for needed upgrades.

action_items.title: Closing readiness and smooth move‑in
action_items.description: Prepare documents (income, SCHUFA, savings proofs), arrange valuation, lock final rate, and coordinate notary. Plan renovations, utilities, and move timeline, keeping a 5–10% buffer for unexpected costs.

quick_wins: Pull free SCHUFA report and correct any errors
Automate monthly savings transfer to a dedicated home fund

Set property alerts on ImmoScout24/Immowelt with €500k–€560k cap
